duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely drive/deliver materials and goods to support the Transport Service Team in the daily execution of service operations.
Collect inventory/goods from the designated collection point and ensure compliance with agreed processes.
Secure the inventory/goods in the vehicle in an organized manner for safe transportation to the end point.
Provide input to the Transport Service Dispatcher to support daily planning of the safest and most efficient short route to clients' end points.
Transport inventory/goods by box truck and cargo van in accordance with all safety procedures and protocol.
Conduct pre-trip vehicle inspections and coordinate regular maintenance checks on assigned vehicles.
Unloading inventory/goods at the destination and ensuring the necessary paperwork is signed to record the successful transfer of goods.
Complete all assigned training and attend operational meetings in support of Transport Service execution.
Timely attendance to duties in a professional, presentable manner.
Ability to lift boxes up to 50 pounds.

education_certification.credential: Current valid driver’s license and ability to pass a Motor Vehicle Record Check
